prompts: What's the story behind your name?
What are you famous for among your friends and family?
What's special about the place you grew up?
What's the last thing you bought yourself?
What do you turn to when you need to recharge?
What are your favorite take-out meals?
What do you eat during the week when you want some comfort food?
What's one of your favorite smells?
Who's a living person that you admire?
What's your guilty pleasure when you have free time during the week?
What do you celebrate during the holidays?
What do you find meaningful about the holidays?
What holiday traditions do you hope to pass on to future generations?
What is your wish for the world?
You discover a wrapped box with your name on it. What do you hope is inside?
Share a time when you've been moved by a piece of art.
What's the most creative thing you've done lately?
Do you have a favorite artist (includes musicians)?
If your life were a movie, what musician or band would create the soundtrack?
Describe your favorite museum. What about it inspires you?
What's a song that fits your mood right now?
What's a lesson you've learned this past year?
What's something from the past year you're grateful for?
What are some adventurous things you've done in the past?
What is an experience you wish you could have for the first time again?
What were your favorite toys as a kid?
If you could only meet one person from the past, who would it be?
Do you have any resolutions for the new year?
Are you a planner or a spontaneous person?
You wake up tomorrow to breaking news: COVID is eradicated! What's the most exciting thing on your to-do list?
If you could have a free day just for yourself, what would you do?
What is something you want to make time for this weekend?
What do you think will be different ten years from now?
